title: (MSFT) Investment Report
text:
February 27, 2024, 16:18 pm ET, BY Christie- Contributor| Editor: Thomas H. Kee Jr. (Follow on LinkedIn) Longer Term Trading Plans for MSFT

Buy MSFT slightly over 397.42 target 419.55 stop loss @ 396.27  Details
The technical summary data tells us to buy MSFT near 397.42 with an upside target of 419.55.  This data also tells us to set a stop loss @ 396.27 to protect against excessive loss in case the stock begins to move against the trade.  397.42 is the first level of support below 407.48 , and by rule, any test of support is a buy signal.  In this case, support 397.42 is being tested, a buy signal would exist.
Short MSFT slightly under 419.55, target 397.42, stop loss @ 420.76  Details
The technical summary data is suggesting a short of MSFT as it gets near 419.55 with a downside target of 397.42.  We should have a stop loss in place at 420.76though. 419.55 is the first level of resistance above 407.48, and by rule, any test of resistance is a short signal.  In this case, if resistance 419.55 is being tested, a short signal would exist. 

Swing Trading Plans for MSFT

Buy MSFT slightly over 410.03, target 419.55, Stop Loss @ 408.85  Details
If 410.03 begins to break higher, the technical summary data tells us to buy MSFT just slightly over 410.03, with an upside target of 419.55.  The data also tells us to set a stop loss @ 408.85 in case the stock turns against the trade.  410.03 is the first level of resistance above 407.48, and by rule, any break above resistance is a buy signal.  In this case, 410.03, initial resistance, would be breaking higher, so a buy signal would exist.  Because this plan is based on a break of resistance, it is referred to as a Long Resistance Plan.
Short MSFT slightly  near 410.03, target 398.36, Stop Loss @ 411.21.  Details
The technical summary data is suggesting a short of MSFT if it tests 410.03 with a downside target of 398.36. We should have a stop loss in place at 411.21 though in case the stock begins to move against the trade.  By rule, any test of resistance is a short signal.  In this case, if resistance, 410.03, is being tested a short signal would exist.  Because this plan is a short plan based on a test of resistance it is referred to as a Short Resistance Plan.

Day Trading Plans for MSFT

Buy MSFT slightly over 409.33, target 410.03, Stop Loss @ 408.38  Details
If 409.33 begins to break higher, the technical summary data tells us to buy MSFT just slightly over 409.33, with an upside target of 410.03.  The data also tells us to set a stop loss @ 408.38 in case the stock turns against the trade.  409.33 is the first level of resistance above 407.48, and by rule, any break above resistance is a buy signal.  In this case, 409.33, initial resistance, would be breaking higher, so a buy signal would exist.  Because this plan is based on a break of resistance, it is referred to as a Long Resistance Plan.
Short MSFT slightly  near 409.33, target 398.36, Stop Loss @ 410.28.  Details
The technical summary data is suggesting a short of MSFT if it tests 409.33 with a downside target of 398.36. We should have a stop loss in place at 410.28 though in case the stock begins to move against the trade.  By rule, any test of resistance is a short signal.  In this case, if resistance, 409.33, is being tested a short signal would exist.  Because this plan is a short plan based on a test of resistance it is referred to as a Short Resistance Plan.
